name: places/ChIJXeb7ieZYwokRQCx3PTaxA2A
formattedAddress: 315 E 58th St #1A, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 315 E 58th St #1A, New York, NY 10022-2024, USA

originalText.text: Maria Ambrosini was an absolute delight to work with. She is talented, kind, and reliable. She tailored both of my wedding dresses and made my wedding veil. I always felt like these special items were in the best of hands, she did an exceptional job!!! I give Maria my highest recommendation!

text.text: Maria Ambrosini was an absolute delight to work with. She is talented, kind, and reliable. She tailored both of my wedding dresses and made my wedding veil. I always felt like these special items were in the best of hands, she did an exceptional job!!! I give Maria my highest recommendation!

originalText.text: Maria is AMAZING. My wedding dress is very intricate and needed a lot of work because it was two sizes too big. Maria has done such a beautiful job. She is mindful of every detail and sewed in a bodice that looks like it has always been part of the dress! She is truly committed to making the dress fit perfectly, even if it means adding additional fittings to the plan. Maria is also mindful of every detail — for example she has added a number of customizations to my dress to make sure my bra remains hidden. I am so grateful that I was referred to Ambrosini Maria — I will now go to her anytime I need something tailored.

originalText.text: Maria is amazing with alterations! Highly recommend her. She was able to work her magic on this horrible mistake of a gown I bought on Etsy. Now I know better and will just ask her to make it next time!

text.text: Maria is amazing with alterations! Highly recommend her. She was able to work her magic on this horrible mistake of a gown I bought on Etsy. Now I know better and will just ask her to make it next time!

originalText.text: Maria is amazing!! She worked tirelessly to please me and make my dress fit exactly how I wanted. She gave so much thought and attention to small details, adding pieces of lace to the front and sides of the dress. I am head over heels with how it turned out. Thank you, Maria!!  You are an artist. :)

text.text: Maria is amazing!! She worked tirelessly to please me and make my dress fit exactly how I wanted. She gave so much thought and attention to small details, adding pieces of lace to the front and sides of the dress. I am head over heels with how it turned out. Thank you, Maria!!  You are an artist. :)

originalText.text:
Maria is a phenomenal dressmaker and seamstress.  I have been going to her for years so when it came time to have alterations made to my wedding gown, I knew she would be the only person I would entrust with such an important task.  Truthfully, my gown needed quite extensive work done to it and Maria worked her miracle!  She made the dress look more magnificent than I could have ever imagined!  She was very responsive to all my phone calls, and she completed the work in such a quick turn-around.  I also called upon her to make my wedding veil, and she replicated the inspiration photographs provided to her flawlessly.

I will forever recommend her to EVERYONE!  As a bride trying to put together a wedding during the pandemic, there are so many stresses, and Maria has not only eliminated all of the stress of the dress, she has made me truly feel like a Bride to be.
